scripts.build:sisp:dev: ng build sisplaer --build-optimizer=false && mvn clean install -f build/sisplaer-3.0
scripts.build:plan:dev: ng build planejamento --base-href=/sisplaer-3.0-planejamento/ --build-optimizer=false && mvn clean install -f build/sisplaer-3.0-planejamento
scripts.build:cred:dev: ng build credito --base-href=/sisplaer-3.0-credito/ --build-optimizer=false && mvn clean install -f build/sisplaer-3.0-credito
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:sisp:dev && npm run build:plan:dev && npm run build:cred:dev
scripts.build:sisp:hom: ng build sisplaer --build-optimizer=false --configuration=homolog && mvn clean install -f build/sisplaer-3.0
scripts.build:plan:hom: ng build planejamento --base-href=/sisplaer-3.0-planejamento/ --build-optimizer=false --configuration=homolog && mvn clean install -f build/sisplaer-3.0-planejamento
scripts.build:cred:hom: ng build credito --base-href=/sisplaer-3.0-credito/ --build-optimizer=false --configuration=homolog && mvn clean install -f build/sisplaer-3.0-credito
scripts.build:hom: npm run build:sisp:hom && npm run build:plan:hom && npm run build:cred:hom
scripts.build:sisp:prod: ng build sisplaer --build-optimizer=false --configuration production && mvn clean install -f build/sisplaer-3.0
scripts.build:plan:prod: ng build planejamento --base-href=/sisplaer-3.0-planejamento/ --build-optimizer=false --configuration production && mvn clean install -f build/sisplaer-3.0-planejamento
scripts.build:cred:prod: ng build credito --base-href=/sisplaer-3.0-credito/ --build-optimizer=false --configuration production && mvn clean install -f build/sisplaer-3.0-credito
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:sisp:prod && npm run build:plan:prod && npm run build:cred:prod
